member.name: T:Task2.IntegerExtensions
member.summary: The IntegerExtensions class. Contains method for finding the great common divisor.

member.name: M:Task2.IntegerExtensions.GetGcd(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds the great common divisor of two integer numbers.
member.param: First integer number to find the great common divisor.
Second integer number to find the great common divisor.
member.exception: Thrown when both numbers are 0 at the same time.
member.returns: The great common divisor of two integer numbers.
